results.name: Anne and the Mystery of the Hidden Assassin
Celebrating the Little Things: A Chaos Adventure

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04, Debian 8, or Fedora 24
  • Processor: SSE2 capable
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: WebGL2 capable
  • Storage: 231 MB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • Processor: 3.5 GHz Quad-Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
